short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Go back to the previous tabs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click the extension icon to return the previous tab. Useful when clicking on a random tab just to close it. Once the tab is closed, simply click the icon to go to the tab you were on before. You can set a keyboard shortcut for this too. chrome://extensions/shortcuts
